name: While You Were Away (Chros, Tori Smith, MarcelineLeiman)
name_original: While You Were Away (Chros, Tori Smith, MarcelineLeiman)
description:
A game created by Chros, Marcy and Tori. 

How long have you avoided home? What will you do one day if there’s nothing to return to?

While You Were Away is an exploration game about finding solace at home, and the one’s loved and lost there.

The game is an exploration into non-linear and environmental storytelling. There are 12 audio logs to discover throughout your journey.

CREDITS
